name: Christian's Mars Marine
description:
My second game!

All Assets from GameDev.TV

Animation & Sound Rigging / Game Development by Christian Incognito

Learning how to make this game was nuts. All the assets, animations, blueprints, variables, etc. it got confusing and mind numbing trying to learn everything so fast. Definitely had to stop, take a day to rest, think about it, then move on to the next section. 

Unlike the first game were I made my own environment, this one I used all assets and environments made by GameDev.TV - it was up to me though to make player movement, actions (death/spawn/line traces), widgets (HUD), and sounds active.

Going through this class definitely gave me ideas on another game I could fully create myself - I can’t wait to slowly take a crack on that next! 

Enjoy this Mars Marine wave shooter! :)

 -Christian Incognito
